examples.example: 成功不一定只属于天赋异禀的人，努力的人也有机会。

translate.english: Success does not necessarily only belong to those with extraordinary talents, and those who work hard also have a chance.

examples.example: 生活中的困难不一定都是坏事，它也许会让我们变得更加坚强和成熟。

translate.english: The difficulties in life are not necessarily all bad things, and it may make us become stronger and more mature.

examples.example: 机会不一定会主动找上门，我们要主动去寻找和把握。

translate.english: Opportunities may not come to us on their own initiative, and we need to take the initiative to seek and grasp them.
